column1: #text=I was had a very stressful day at work and decided the best way to relax tonight was with a nice , warm bath .
#text=I set down a few candles , not too many , and started the water .
#text=After I let the water warm up a bit , I stopped the drain , and the tub slowly filled with warm water .
#text=I put in some mineral salts to help make the experience more pleasing .
#text=Once the tub was full , I took off all my clothes and got inside .
#text=For the most part , all I did was rest there and relax .
#text=It was a great way to slow things down on a fast-paced day .
#text=For several minutes , I just enjoyed the warm water but I made sure to wash up with soap and shampoo before the water got too cold .
#text=Once , I was done I unplugged the tub drain and got to dry myself off .
